Adding yourself

Students, introduce yourself via a GITHUB_USERNAME.json file under the _data/2016/ directory, and submit via pull request. Hereâ€™s an example:

// _data/2016/afeld.json
{
 "emoji": "dancer",
 "introduction": "Developer at 18F by day, dancer by night."
}

Using the format above, replace with your own emoji (choose from this list) and introduction.
